Server.Core

Class SchemaList

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.Core.SchemaList

  • public class SchemaList
extends java.lang.Object
    Produces a list of SchemaData for for population of a select list on the main page by Vicar.
    Version:
    0.1, 12/15/2012
    Author:
    Frank Smutniak, Center for Digital Research in the Humanities, http://cdrh.unl.edu
    See Also:
    SchemaData, Vicar

      void generateSchemaXML(org.xml.sax.ContentHandler contentHandler, java.util.Vector<SchemaData> the_schemaList)
      Generate the XML representation of the SchemaData list for use in the XML output produced by Vicar.
      java.util.Vector<SchemaData> getSchemaList(java.lang.String the_OwnerPath, java.lang.String the_DirStr, java.lang.String the_current)
      Returns a list of SchemaData objects for all schema files; both system supplied and those uploaded by the user into the current collection.

      • getSchemaList

        public java.util.Vector<SchemaData> getSchemaList(java.lang.String the_OwnerPath,
                                         java.lang.String the_DirStr,
                                         java.lang.String the_current)
        Returns a list of SchemaData objects for all schema files; both system supplied and those uploaded by the user into the current collection.
        Parameters:
        the_OwnerPath - The Owner's subpath.
        the_DirStr - The user collection name.
        the_current - The name of the currently selected schema file.
        Returns:
        A Vector of SchemaData objects.
